thread.title: Jake Livermore close to £10million switch from Hull to West Brom as Tony Pulis ties up his first deal of transfer window
thread.title_full: Jake Livermore close to £10million switch from Hull to West Brom as Tony Pulis ties up his first deal of transfer window

author: ituckey
title: Jake Livermore close to £10million switch from Hull to West Brom as Tony Pulis ties up his first deal of transfer window
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments TONY PULIS will seal his first transfer of the January window when Jake Livermore completes his £10million move from Hull tomorrow morning. 
The former Spurs midfielder underwent a club medical last night after agreeing personal terms on a four-year-deal. PA:Press Association 4 Midfielder Jake Livermore is poised to swap relegation-threatened Hull for WBA 
The 27-year-old could even make a rapid home debut against Sunderland on Saturday as he competes with Argentine midfielder Claudio Yacob to partner Darren Fletcher in the Baggies ’ midfield. 
Keep up to date with ALL the football news , gossip and transfers on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
However reports that Pulis has also agreed a £20million deal for Watford ’s out-of-favour striker Odion Ighalo are premature. 
4 The future of West Brom striker Saido Berahino is still the subject of rumours 
West Brom did attempt to swap Saido Berahino in a player-plus-cash deal for the 27-year-old Nigerian last summer but it is unlikely they would be able to pull off a similar arrangement now. 
Despite making an initial enquiry, West Brom have not entered into talks with the Hornets over Ighalo yet, although they are monitoring the striker’s situation. PA:Press Association 4 Baggies boss Tony Pulis ready to make his first mark on the transfer window 
Albion have admitted defeat in their chase for Southampton skipper Jose Fonte who looks to be on his way to West Ham after his wife made it clear she preferred the prospect of life in London, rather than moving to the Midlands.
